snippet: he cruise line earned $37 million, or 5 cents a share, in the quarter ended Feb. 28, after a loss of $139 million, or 18 cents a share, a year earlier.
abstract: Carnival Corporation reports first-quarter profit, despite highly publicized problems with several cruise excursions; earned $37 million, or 5 cents a share, in quarter ending Feb 28, after loss of $139 million, or 18 cents a share, in year-ago period.
lead_paragraph: he cruise line earned $37 million, or 5 cents a share, in the quarter ended Feb. 28, after a loss of $139 million, or 18 cents a share, a year earlier.
